BBEX3.A.AZN.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Azerbaijan / EUR 1 = AZN ... (middle)
General: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2006 at the rate of AZM 5,000 = AZN 1; for exchange rates until 2005, see BBEX2:A:AZM:EUR:CA:AC:A04.
Source: Central Bank of Azerbaijan, Baku (formerly: National Bank of Azerbaijan).
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.
